title: User Registration Success
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid information.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter valid user details including username, email, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Check that registration is successful and user is redirected to the dashboard.

title: User Registration with Missing Fields
description: Verify that registration fails when required fields are missing.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Leave one or more required fields empty.
Submit the registration form.
Check that error messages appear for missing fields and registration is prevented.

title: Login Success
description: Verify that a registered user can login successfully with valid credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Check that login is successful and dashboard is loaded.

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails when incorrect username/email or password is used.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email or password.
Click the login button.
Check that appropriate error message is displayed and login is denied.

title: Password Recovery Workflow
description: Verify the password recovery process works correctly with valid email.

steps.description: Navigate to the password recovery page.
Enter registered email address.
Submit the password recovery request.
Check for confirmation that recovery email was sent.
Follow password reset link and set a new password.
Verify that the new password is accepted and user can login with it.

title: Multi-step Project Creation Wizard Completion
description: Verify that a user can complete the full multi-step project creation wizard including AI task suggestions.

steps.description: From the dashboard, initiate new project creation.
Fill in project details in the initial step.
Proceed to timeline setup and review AI suggested tasks and milestones.
Accept or modify AI suggested tasks.
Complete final review and submit to create project.
Check that the project is created and visible in active projects list.

title: Project Creation Wizard Handling AI Task Suggestion Rejections
description: Verify user can reject or modify AI suggestions during project setup and continue successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to project creation wizard.
View AI suggested tasks and milestones.
Reject or modify suggested tasks.
Complete remaining steps and submit project.
Verify that project is created with user-modified or no AI suggested tasks.

title: Kanban Board Task CRUD Operations
description: Verify task creation, reading, updating, and deletion functionality on the Kanban board.

steps.description: Access the Kanban board for a project.
Create a new task with valid information.
Confirm the new task appears in the appropriate status column.
Edit the task details.
Check that changes are saved and displayed correctly.
Delete the task.
Confirm the task is removed from the board.

title: Kanban Board Drag-and-Drop Task Reordering and Status Update
description: Verify tasks can be reordered via drag-and-drop within and across status columns updating their statuses accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to project Kanban board.
Drag a task to a different position within the same status column.
Verify task order updates visually and persists.
Drag the same task to a different status column.
Confirm the task status is updated and reflected correctly.

title: AI Document Analysis and Task Generation Accuracy
description: Verify the AI document analysis functionality correctly extracts key points and generates meaningful tasks.

steps.description: Navigate to document analysis page.
Upload a valid academic document.
Verify AI extracts relevant key points from the document.
Verify AI generates meaningful and contextually accurate project task suggestions.
Accept or modify the generated tasks.
Check that tasks can be saved and integrated into project task list.

title: Project Calendar Task Display and Interaction
description: Verify calendar displays tasks and deadlines correctly with color coding and supports quick task addition and edits.

steps.description: Open the project calendar page.
Verify all relevant project tasks and deadlines are displayed with appropriate color coding.
Add a new task directly on a calendar date.
Confirm the new task appears in calendar and project task list.
Reschedule an existing task by dragging it to a different date on the calendar.
Verify task deadline updates and calendar view reflects the change.
Edit task details from calendar interface.
Check that edits persist and display correctly in calendar and task details page.

title: Resource Linking and Retrieval without File Upload
description: Verify users can add and manage linked resources (links or references) within projects and retrieve them effectively.

steps.description: Navigate to resource management page for a project.
Add a new linked resource with a valid URL and description.
Verify linked resource is saved and appears in the resource list.
Edit details of an existing linked resource.
Confirm changes are reflected correctly.
Remove a linked resource.
Verify it is removed from the resource list.

title: Project Messaging Real-time Collaboration and Mentions
description: Verify that real-time messaging operates correctly with message sending, receiving, and mention notifications.

steps.description: Navigate to project messaging page.
Send a new message within a project conversation.
Check message appears immediately in the conversation.
Mention a user by using '@' and selecting the username.
Verify the mentioned user receives a notification and mention highlight in message.
Receive a message from another user and verify it appears in real-time.

title: Notification Delivery with User Preferences Respected
description: Verify notifications are delivered timely and user notification preferences are honored.

steps.description: Navigate to notification settings page.
Adjust notification preferences (e.g., email alerts, in-app alerts).
Confirm changes save successfully.
Trigger a notification event (e.g., new project sharing or task assignment).
Verify notification is delivered or withheld according to user preferences.

title: Data Insights Accuracy and Visualization
description: Verify data insights page accurately reflects project progress and productivity metrics with clear visualizations.

steps.description: Navigate to data insights page.
Verify displayed progress metrics match project data.
Check visual charts and analytics accurately represent productivity and deadlines.
Update task statuses and verify the insights update accordingly.

title: User Profile Editing and Account Settings Update
description: Verify users can edit their profile and update account settings successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to edit profile page.
Modify user profile details such as display name, contact information.
Save changes.
Verify updated profile details are saved and displayed correctly.
Navigate to account settings page.
Change user preferences or settings.
Confirm that settings changes persist without errors.

title: Project Archiving and Restoration
description: Verify that projects can be archived and restored properly without data loss.

steps.description: Select an active project and archive it.
Confirm project moves to archived projects list and is no longer active.
Restore the archived project.
Verify project returns to active project list with all data intact.

title: Performance: Dashboard Load Time Under 2 Seconds
description: Verify that the main dashboard loads fully within 2 seconds under standard network conditions.

steps.description: Navigate to the dashboard page with several active projects and deadlines.
Measure and confirm page load time is under 2 seconds.

title: Performance: API Response Time Under 500ms for Project Tasks
description: Verify that API responses for project task retrieval and updates respond in under 500ms.

steps.description: Request task list from backend via API.
Confirm API response time is less than 500 milliseconds.
Submit task update requests (e.g., status change).
Ensure response times remain under 500 milliseconds.

title: Error Handling: Invalid Project Creation Input
description: Verify appropriate error messages and prevention of project creation when invalid or incomplete data is entered.

steps.description: Start a new project creation wizard.
Leave required fields empty or enter invalid data (e.g., invalid date ranges).
Attempt to proceed or submit the project.
Verify error messages are displayed and project creation is blocked until valid data is provided.
